attributes.action: Force Medway council to prevent accidental deaths along the Medway River
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All too many times medway residents hear that somone has died because the railings in various locations around the river are too low and anywhere that does have a camera is un-monitored. I urge the PM to force the council to pay attention to this and force the council to rectify this persitant problem
